mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIL_LOGIN_SESSION (JTI, USER_ID, DOMAIN, CLIENT_IP, USER_AGENT, LOGIN_TIME, LAST_ACCESS) VALUES (#{jti}, #{userId}, #{domain}, #{clientIp}, #{userAgent}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MAIL_LOGIN_SESSION WHERE JTI = #{jti}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MAIL_LOGIN_SESSION WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DOMAIN = #{domain}
mapper.select: SELECT JTI, CLIENT_IP, USER_AGENT, LOGIN_TIME, LAST_ACCESS, DEVICE_NAME FROM MAIL_LOGIN_SESSION WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DOMAIN = #{domain} ORDER BY LOGIN_TIME DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIL_USER_DEVICE (USER_ID, DOMAIN, DEVICE_NAME, USER_AGENT, IS_ALLOWED) VALUES (#{userId}, #{domain}, #{deviceName}, #{userAgent}, TRUE)
INSERT INTO MAIL_LOGIN_HISTORY (USER_ID, DOMAIN, JTI, CLIENT_IP, USER_AGENT, LOGIN_TIME, ACTION) VALUES (#{userId}, #{domain}, #{jti}, #{clientIp}, #{userAgent}, NOW(), #{action})
